content:
I would like to request a PlanDefinition with all referenced ActivityDefinitions included in the result. But in the response only the PlanDefinition itself comes back.
I tried it with the MedicationRequest and Medication, that works fine.
Can anyone help me with the request for the PlanDefinition?

Works on MedicationRequest:
GET http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/MedicationRequest?_id=2108980&_include=MedicationRequest:medication

Doesn't work on PlanDefinition:
GET http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/PlanDefinition?_id=a05feeec-019a-4e29-ad2b-b7c3b3940f49&_include=PlanDefinition:definition
Does the server claim to support that _include?
I used the public hapi test server. In the conformance statement is PlanDefinition:definition listed under searchInclude, so I think the server does, if I understood it correctly

@Michaela Ziegler this is because your definitions are URIs and not references:

        "definitionUri": "ActivityDefinition/d1beee57-bf0f-422d-8767-e5286c872b3e"

If you replace definitionUri with definitionCanonical this should work.
